summary: JUST SO HAPPENED WHEN WE PULLED INTO THE DRIVEWAY MY WIFE SAID THE BRAKES WENT OUT AND I THOUGHT NOTHING OF IT. I DUMPED MY SEWER AND WENT TO PULL UP INTO MY NORMAL PARKING PLACE AT MY PLACE OF RESIDENCE AND I HAD NO BRAKES AND ALMOST RAN INTO MY GARAGE. I PUMPED THEM SEVERAL TIME AND MANAGED TO STOP. A HOLE HAD RUSTED THROUGH IN ONE SPOT WHERE AN OFFSET WAS BENT IN THE BRAKE LINE AND WHILE REPAIRING I FOUND ANOTHER SPOT RIGHT NEXT TO IT THAT I PUSHED A HOLE IN IT WITH MY POCKET KNIFE. LUCKILY IT HAPPENED IN THE DRIVEWAY AND NOT ON THE HIGHWAY WHERE WE HAD JUST CAME FROM A 200 MILE TRIP.  *TR

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 GEORGIE BOY CRUISE MASTER 3640 MOTOR HOME. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE PARKED, THE BATHROOM SHOWER DOOR SHATTERED AFTER BEING CLOSED. THE FAILURE CAUSED THE CONTACT TO SUSTAIN LACERATIONS TO THE FOOT. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO THE DEALER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND CONFIRMED THAT THE VIN FAILED TO QUALIFY FOR REPAIRS UNDER NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 08V639000(EQUIPMENT:RECREATIONAL VEHICLE). THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE FAILURE AND THE CURRENT MILEAGES WERE 59,500.
